segments.text: I observe the kitchen setup, with the sink on the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman faces left, attentively drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water flows from the faucet into the full basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spilling over the edge steadily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle forms on the floor beneath.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot touches the water, but she continues.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the left, cabinets hang open above the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar sits inside, partially accessed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy stands on a stool, reaching in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands nearby, arm extended upward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above shows a garden path and plants.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are pulled back on the panes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stack on the counter beside the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene captures a typical domestic moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
